episodes.title: TheBugle review of the year: 2013
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Andy Zaltzman introduces a look back at some of the biggest headlines of the last 12 months. May include births, deaths, political misjudgements, and inappropriate behaviour at a funeral (for the 2nd consecutive year).

episodes.author: The Bugle

So what do the worlds leaders make of the wealth gap? It's Boris Johnson v The Pope!

Plus, the police stuff the queen's nuts in their mouths and pigs react to the sale of their seed.

episodes.summary:
...is about IT glitches with the launch of Obamacare.

Plus why spying would have saved Jesus, Spain plans to jail all of the USA, church wangs and Vatican cricket.

Happy 250 Buglers!

episodes.summary: Robert Mugabe is going nowhere without a struggle, especially when he still gets 103% of the vote. Plus, Silvio Berlusconi is back in the news! Thanks Silvio!

episodes.author: The Bugle

episodes.summary: Andy and John provide the latest immigration news from each side of the Atlantic, present some car park news and get an email about cats.

episodes.author: The Bugle

episodes.author: The Bugle

episodes.title: Bugle 218 – Cliff Diving

episodes.summary: In the 1st Bugle of 2013 the US going cliff diving, the Germans get angry, Mohamed Morsi gets dissed and 'Old Crownhead' gives her annual speech.

episodes.title: The Bugle – The Complete 2012 – Part 2

episodes.summary: The 2nd installment of our highlights of 2012. What a year! GOLD FOR 2012!

episodes.summary: The Bugle celebrates the 1st half of 2012, and reveals the new logo.

episodes.title: Bugle 217 – Silvio’s Christmas Gift

episodes.title: Bugle 216 – We’re having a baby!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary:
Nothing else matters in the world as "We're Having A Baby!"

Kate of the Royals and that William are not the only ones expectant as the planet gets a massive case of baby brain.

This Bugle was created in five different time zones, spanning 13.5 Earth hours as John records amongst the stars in Los Angeles and Andy chows down on some choice bovine cuts in Calcutta.

episodes.title: Bugle 215 – Let’s Nuke The Moon!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Andy and John explore the American plans to blow up the moon, continued trouble in the middle east, a crime free NYC and they meet THE Indian.

episodes.summary: The battle to be US president descends to one level above/below boxing match. In other news, Scotland slides away, war crimes news and Bugler attempts to beat Chris to title of The Bugle's worst distance runner.

episodes.author: The Bugle

episodes.summary: Andy and John provide the latest from Democrapalooza, offer the latest smart phone reviews, reveal what a vicar should never sing at a funeral, place lies into categories and discuss the latest waparazzi news

episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Andy and John recover from the Olympics by diving into the US elections. Apparently they happen later this year

episodes.summary: Bankers are bad, mermaids don't exist and the Olympics are near.

episodes.title: Bugle 200 – The horn dog returneth!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: The Bugle celebrates it's 200th edition with the return of two old favourites. Also in the news, evil bankers are making us learn boring things, and Kim Jong Un reveals his virility. Plus, should we fire missiles at the rain?

episodes.title: The Bugle – Andy Zaltzman Speaks
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: With the 200th Bugle just a week away, Andy Zaltzman takes his turn to take listener questions. Producer Chris asks the questions, excellently.

episodes.title: The Bugle – John Oliver Speaks
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: As The Bugle prepares to celebrate a fine double century, producer Chris puts some listener questions to John

episodes.title: Bugle 199 – This is an ex-president!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Andy and John bring the latest from Egypt where democracy and the health of it's former leader are teetering on the edge. In other news, wealthy Brits are treating tax as a voluntary act of philanthropy, a Syrian has big brass balls and the US gets in knots over knitting

episodes.title: Bugle 198 – Warm up and melt down
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: The world prepares for another half-arsed attempt to save itself, sheep are unleased on London 2012, Elvis is alive, and Andy gives the most complete analysis of the Eurozone crisis yet,

episodes.title: Bugle 197 – Singing in the Reign
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: A reviewbilee of the Queen's festivities. Plus, in other news; killer terrorist furniture causes chaos and Euro 2012 begins to a chorus of jeers and pessimism.

episodes.title: Bugle 196 – Jubilee Special
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: The Bugle celebrates 60 years of the Q-Unit. In other news, Obama's kill list, the UN is unimpressed with Syria and doctoring the pension contributions.

episodes.title: Bugle 195 – A drop of Reagan’s Blood
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: The latest news from the Egyptian elections, hosting it's 1st democratic election in 7000 years, and from London 2012, where there are many missiles on buildings.

episodes.title: The Bugle – 194a – Too Good For Context
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Some amazing clips from recent shows, in the wrong order

episodes.title: Bugle 194 – Global Election Round Up
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: So what's been happening at the ballot box in Mexico, Russia, Greece and France? The Bugle investigates. Plus, Obama shows Cameron how to inspire.

episodes.title: Bugle 193 – Happy Deathiversary!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Osama Bin Laden's death commemoration special! Plus Gingrich promises holograms and 32% of the people of Britain have spoken.

episodes.title: Bugle 192 – Uncle Rupert is the real victim
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary:
Kindly Uncle Rupert meets Lord Leveson, France goes to the polls, Newt makes a statement and Israel and Palestine become penpals.

And this is how a Bugler cooks...http://thebuglepodcast.com/?p=317

episodes.title: Bugle 191 – A secret servicing
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Sex scandal special! Plus, penguin eats newt, town proposes shocking name change and producer Chris is set to win the London Mararthon. Support him here: http://uk.virginmoneygiving.com/HackneyEmpire

episodes.title: Bugle 190 – Santorum splashes out
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: The Republican race to win the right to lose hots up. Plus a Titanic celebration and rowing about rowing. http://thebuglepodcast.com/

episodes.title: Bugle 189 – ‘Like eating Bill Cosby’
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Andy and John finally deliver an Antarctic special, plus Chinese art news, and a new season in the US version of Rounders. Recorded in a special location.

episodes.title: Bugle 188 – Gentlemen, start your engines!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: It's panic stations at the fuel pumps, as the public waste money that could be more wisely invested in a meal with the Prime Minister or funding a Republican candidate campaign. Failing that, a tepid working class pasty.

episodes.title: The Bugle Q&A, vol 1
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: A listener generated Q&A. If it's bad, it's your fault http://thebuglepodcast.com/

episodes.title: Bugle 187 – The President’s Playlist
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Assad's account gets hacked, anonymous Brit visits the US and ugly dog dies. Visit http://thebuglepodcast.com/

episodes.title: Bugle 186 – An Insult to Civic Society
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Together in New York! Andy and John round up the latest global election news and take an unorthodox mathematics test. http://thebuglepodcast.com/

episodes.title: Bugle 185 – Burning Rings Of Steel
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: How is London getting on with the Olympics? How wet is Angela Merkel? What have News International been up to? http://thebuglepodcast.com/

episodes.title: Bugle 184 – Wangderlust
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Following the Lady Special, now The Bugle presents a Man Special. Except the latest hot news on the 'Y' chromosome, and other droobler based stories.

episodes.title: Bugle 183 – Bugle Lady Special
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary:
It's been a bad week if you are of the opposite gender to Andy and John, so The Bugle shows some sisterly solidarity.

May contain mentions of the Taleban, and Rick Santorum

episodes.title: Bugle 182 – Stockpiling Humanity
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Maldiviacs revolt, Capello quits, Syria sinks, and Dickens dives.

episodes.title: Bugle 181 – A Knight’s Fail
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Syria slips further, Mitt the Mighty, and Sir Fred is dead. Well, not dead, just Fred.

episodes.title: Bugle 180 – The truth about lies
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Lies, damn lies and cricket statistics. Plus, a round up of presidential news, what's driving Canada over the edge, and the battle for Saddam's butt cheek.

episodes.title: Bugle 179 – Playas gon play
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: This week - oh PIPA, Republican't candidates and Craptain Italia. Remember to #savethebugle at http://www.thebuglepodcast.com

episodes.title: Hello Buglers!
episodes.author: The Bugle
episodes.summary: Hello Buglers, if this has turned up in your iTunes folder or similar device for downloading then it means the changeover has worked...
